topic: Autonomous Navigation for Flying Robots Course Inquiry

correspondence.message: Hi, I am a BSc student at TUM. I want to participate in the course '[IN2318] Autonomous Navigation for Flying Robots' (2 ECTS), but I am unable to contact the responsible instructor. Could you please guide me? Below is the information about the course module: https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/WBMODHB.wbShowMHBReadOnly?pKnotenNr=1126210"

The course IN2318 takes place irregularly and was last offered in the summer semester of 2021. It is unlikely to be offered in the upcoming winter semester. Please look for other courses that cover interesting topics.
